original_email.subject: Business Proposal - Software Development Partnership
original_email.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to propose a potential partnership for software development services. Our company is interested in exploring collaboration opportunities in the field of enterprise solutions.

Could you please provide information regarding your service offerings and estimated project timelines?

Best regards,
John Smith
Business Development Manager
